attributes.action: Increase funding for Mental Health Services
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is a petition to increase funding for Mental Health Services around the UK.
Many people suffer everyday and try their best to receive help from such services, but unfortunately many are turned away because the services are not funded enough to support as many people as needed. As a result, many suffer along and become within the risk of suicide simply because there is not enough money to help them.

rejection.details: Please see: Better Adult Mental Health Services
